website_summaries.verdict: Super Mario 3D Land does a fantastic job of demonstrating what the 3DS can do with its wide variety of levels, stunning 3D effects, and precise controls, all for a low entry price.
pros: Tanooki Suit returns to help Mario float over treacherous jumps
cons: The 3D effect isn’t absolutely necessary to enjoy the game

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic game! Even better with 3D effect on!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic game! Although it is kinda linear just like a regular 2D Mario game, the 3D space and movement make it great! There's lots of levels to explore and plenty of secrets to look for. Most importantly, this game makes great use of the 3D effect of the 3DS systems. Several levels are designed in such a way that the depth illusion that comes with the 3D effect allows you to find secrets much faster than without it. Even though it is perfectly playable in 2D, I would highly recommend switching on the 3D effect if your system supports it. Haven't finished the game yet, but I'm loving it more the more I play it :D
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great game! my daughter is loving it. Nice that it can also be used on the 2ds
customer_reviews.author: BLorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Solid mario gameplay.
customer_reviews.text: The game is a fun entry in the Mario universe, featuring 3d gameplay that doesnt quite feel as liberated as something like Mario 64, but certainly far more than something like New Super Mario Bros. It has the classic feel of most mario games and is a solid game to own for the handheld,especially at the cheap price point.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Love this game "MARIO ROCKS"
customer_reviews.text: Levels are exciting and fun. Colors are bright almost heavenly, Graphics are 3D a added enhancement to the Super Mario Series. I am still working on solving the levels. Improvements are incredible it looks and feels real. Nintendo really stepped the game up with this one. I highly recommend this if you are a Mario fan like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Allon Shabazz

customer_reviews.title: What's a Nintendo without a Mario Game
customer_reviews.text: I really like this game! A good update to the traditional Mario. You can't really own a Nintendo without having a Mario game :)
customer_reviews.author: Shantanu Karmarkar

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this game! You don't need a manual to advance in the game, but the manual will prepare you for changes in the game from the Super Nintendo version. Coming from the 2D version, it was an adjustment to the 3D, but the 3D levels are so fun! Love the gameplay. My six-year-old son finds it positivelt challenging and thrives on beating levels. He is addicted to the game. The levels are fun to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Danny R.

customer_reviews.title: Ohhhhh My Goodness!!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a must own game!!! With the price now being $19.99, a steal of a deal, you can’t go wrong if you enjoy Mario games on any level.

customer_reviews.title: The 3d is Meh
customer_reviews.text: The essential of a Nintedo system is a plumber most grew up to control. This game will give a challenge and trigger collecting every single object. Doesn't hold your hand on exploring with no map to give a clue on landscape as you need to think of where they place star coins.

product_meta.title: Nintendo Selects: Super Mario 3D Land - 3DS
product_meta.description: Platform:Nintendo 3DS| Edition:StandardNintendo Selects highlights a variety of great games at a great price, including this one. The Super Mario 3D Land game reinvents everything fans love about Mario gaming with a platforming environment in true 3D. Players can experience an exhilarating sense of depth, distance and speed while running, jumping and stomping on enemies throughout the levels. The fan-favorite Tanooki suit also makes its return; you can use the Tanooki Suit's tail to attack enemies or float gently down from great heights. These abilities help players move through the 3D environments with more confidence. Use Parental Controls to restrict 3D mode for children 6 and under.
feature_bullets: Nintendo Selects highlights a variety of great games at a great price, including this One.
The Super Mario 3D land game reinvents everything fans love about Mario gaming with a platforming environment in true 3D.
Use Parental Controls to restrict 3D mode for children 6 and under.
Entertainment Software Rating Board (ESRB) Content Description: Cartoon violence
